name: Star Warsmash
description:
An Star Wars themed Smash Bros. early prototype, made for learning.

Play like in Smash Bros., charge attack with stick smash+button, release to attack.

You can jump (and double jump) with East gamepad button (circle, B).

You can also grab the cube with R1/RB, and then throw it with the left stick.

PROTOTYPE IN CONSTRUCCTION.
